page.title: 16Fishing in the Lea Valley
page.content: The Lea Valley has many good spots for fishing.It also has many decent fishing tackle shops like Simpsons of Turnford and Arnolds. Fishing is a popular sport in the Lea Valley and more clubs are opening with private waters that are regulary stocked with different breeds, such as pike and perch.One of the best fishing spots for producing large fish that is open to all members of the public is Fishers Green pits.Also just by the side of the pits is the River Lea. Beside Fishers Green is the Metropoliton Police fishing lake,but this is a private fishery.The North Met is also very popular and it lies east of the River Lea.Another spot is the boating lake down Brookfield Lane.The fishing season in the Lea Valley starts on the 8th of June.
